Summary: ufo flew about 60 ft above me and a friend
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Greensburg
There were no other sightings in Greensburg on or around July 17th 2004
divs: Sighting Detailswe saw what looked like headlights in the sky a long ways off and we thought nothing of it kept on talking joking about how it looked like the flubber car from the robin williams movie we kind of forgot about it and kept talking we looked up and noticed it was problably 100 or so feet away and coming straight at us very slowly we were in shock we couldn't believe what we were seeing it flew right over top of us it was about 25 feet long and half that wide it was a hexagon shape it was going about 5mph if that i could of walked faster than it was going it made a quiet humming sound and had what looked like headlights same color and everything and there were red lights on all 6 points of the hexagon they didn't blink nothing on it blinked we could make out angles of the object it reminded me of how a stealth bomber looks real sharp angles on the sides of the object it was a dark color it looked black it was just over the top of the trees i could of hit it with a rock my friend was going to shine a flashlight at it i smacked it out of his hand there is a little more detail but nothing to speak of i reported this some time ago to the indiana mufon network and spoke to someone from there and he acted like i was making it up and told me ufos are usually cigar shaped disc shaped etc. i told him to think of these ufo shapes as different makes and models of cars he laughed i'm reporting it again with the hopes that someone from the site can contact me about this this is the most shocking thing i have seen but just a fraction of what i unfortunately have witnessed i make any ufo special look boring and i am trying to understand why
